mutants.code:
import math

def find_max_step_size(n, R, homes):
    homes.sort()
    max_step_size = abs(homes[0] + R)
    for home in homes:
        step_size = abs(home - R)
        max_step_size = math.gcd(step_size, max_step_size)
    return max_step_size

import math

def find_max_step_size(n, R, homes):
    homes.sort()
    max_step_size = abs(homes[0] * R)
    for home in homes:
        step_size = abs(home - R)
        max_step_size = math.gcd(step_size, max_step_size)
    return max_step_size

import math

def find_max_step_size(n, R, homes):
    homes.sort()
    max_step_size = abs(homes[0] - R)
    for home in homes:
        step_size = abs(home + R)
        max_step_size = math.gcd(step_size, max_step_size)
    return max_step_size

    homes.sort()
